column2: There are 3 possible ways to exclude windows from the dynamic feature:
Title of the window. This one checks if the title contains the substring instead of searching for an exact match
Window class name. Can be found with programs like Window Spy from AutoHotKeys or Spy++
As you might have noticed, all lines beginning with "
column3:
is a comment.
; if you find dynamic windows is not working correctly
; uncomment the line below. Note: this will make dynamic windows not work for UWP apps
; exename, ApplicationFrameHost.exe
